thread.title: Friendly staff, good location
thread.title_full: Friendly staff, good location - Review of nyma, the New York Manhattan Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: topaktao
title: Friendly staff, good location
text:
We needed to stay another nite in the city and found Nyma for its location and price. It would have been better if we knew where the parking garage ahead of time but that's where the problem occurred . Unloading our luggage in front of the hotel before check-in time we left our vehicle unattended for few minutes . When my husband got back the parking police already writing us a ticket .unbelievable ! Just hoping its waived because it would be a very expensive stay .
Other than that we like the hotel . Friendly polite staff . The rooftop bar have a great view of The Empire State Building that is beautifully lit at nite.
The rooms are typical NYC size . There's a complimentary continental breakfast
It's located in Koreatown and a short subway / Uber ride to Times Square . Lots of restaurants (Korean) and such around . Nightlife is safe . Manhattan Mall is a block away. It's easy to navigate around with a google map.
